Text:
Phew...we've gone pretty far. Where could that boar
have run off to...?

Six kilometers away from our hideout... There are
still strong traces... It has long-lasting effects...
Hmm...

Talking about research at a time like this...
You know this is all your fault, right?
Sorry.
No you're not...
Research...requires sacrifices...

Well, it's not a good idea when those sacrifices
happen to be me and Shadow Garden.
I'm just a bit sorry...in regards to that...
Just a bit, huh...

I can't afford to lose Shadow Garden...
I like my lab...

I want an environment where I can conduct research...
And the Garden wants results from my research.
Our motives align... That is all.
I'll do anything as long as it benefits Lord Shadow.

Now! Let's cut the chatter and continue pursuing
that boar.
That's easy...because it's leaving...large traces...

That's true. With all these large fallen trees,
broken boulders, and deeply emedded
footprints... It's pretty obvious.

This path should've been a dead end, but it destroyed
a boulder and continued forward.

The boar's strength is up five times more than
usual...my experiment worked wonders.
I'm glad I didn't take it...
After we catch it, I wish to collect data...

It seems that the boar is still continuing its
rampage. Looking at these footprints, it hasn't
slowed down even climbing this slope.
*pant*...*pant*...
On the other hand, we have.
We should...take a break...

What're you saying? The sooner we catch that
boar the better. With your lack of stamina, we're
not getting any closer.
I'm the brains...not the brawn...

Either way, going up this slope in this condition is
going to take us a while.
Beta, I have an idea.

We're not taking a break. The moment we do that,
we won't be able to move again.
Carry me.
Uh...

Carry me on your back. We can save time by going up
this hill together.
No way, that'll wear me out...
With your lack of stamina, you're not going anywhere.
Ugh, I just said that...

If you make me climb this hill in my present
condition, the possibility of us falling will be...100%.

What're you talking all high and mighty for... ugh.
Fine, get on.
Don't mind if I do...
Agh...! You're h-heavy...
I feel that I'm light for an elf.
For an elf...?! Okay, here we go...!
*pant, pant*... I'm beat...
There it is.

How long do I have to keep carrying you for...
It what?
See, over there. It's sleeping...
*snore*... *snore*...

I bet it collapsed from exhaustion as opposed to
merely sleeping.
So the effects have worn off...

I guess, but thank goodness. Now we can safely
grab it.

Such a pity... I was hoping that you would fight it
so I could get combat data...

How could you say such a thing...at a time
like this...?

And if it wasn't for you getting tired along the way,
I wouldn't have wasted all my energy carrying you!
I did not take that into account...
Fine...let's just catch this thing and forget about it.

Hmm...fine. There'll be plenty of chances for me
to get data...
I'm praying that there won't be a next time...
Okay, I'm leaving it to you.
You're leaving what to me?
Taking the boar back to Shadow Garden.
Ugh... I forgot we have to carry it back...
Come on...you can do it.

You should have recovered some energy by now!
So, help me!
Agh...give me a break...
